lore: The Cinder Devil likes to hide in dark neighborhoods and look for drunk people who walk aimlessly at night. When it finds one, it stands behind them and follows behind. Suddenly, its sword hits the ground and the blade begins to crack the paving stones. The drunk person turns with a start and sees a figure wrapped in darkness. Before they can think of what to do, the Cinder Devil lights a fire in its right hand, and the slaughter begins.
menagerieDialog: You're the big boss here, right? You should share some of them resources with me, neh?
I prefer blades over magic. What's the fun in casting a spell when there's no blood to show in the aftermath of your effort?
The devil's in the details, neh?\n\n(Well, that was random.)
I have an idea! You should raise your kingdom's taxes. That way, you can steal from everyone with impunity.
I absolutely, positively did not steal this bag of coins from anyone.
name: Cinder Devil
